channel.title: Paths...no one ever helps me
channel.description: I can compile using [code] @echo off javac *.java pause[/code] which means i have my paths set right? NO i cant run using this(i used to use this) [code]@echo off java *.java[/code] but instead this is the only thing that works [code]@ECHO OFF SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code] and this does not [code]@echo off SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java *.java[/code] Anyone help?

item.title: Paths...no one ever helps me
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

i posted my compiler about 5 times, and all 5 times it clearly stated im using jdk6u3…
this whole topic is about path setting, and why i cant use java *.java…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2008, 01:49:31 PM[/size][hr]OK hopefully someone can help me now


And i still cant use
java *.java
to run my server

Read full topic

item.title: Paths...no one ever helps me
item.dc:creator: @revz2k7 revz2k7
item.description:
@revz2k7 wrote:

ok heres a useful one edit your compiler or runner and change the C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin to C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin it will work wherever you see that in the runner or compiler it change the 02 to 03.

Read full topic

item.title: Paths...no one ever helps me
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

useless post never fails…
if you read, you would realize i want to use the processes i used to use, learned from a bakatool video
javac *.java which is compile
java *.java which is run
and im trying this on MULTIPLE sources…so thanks for your help

Read full topic

item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

i dont want to use mySQL…plus
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
indicates to me that i dont have paths set, and I want them set before i start working

item.title: Paths...no one ever helps me
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

I can compile using

@echo off javac *.java pause
which means i have my paths set right? NO
i cant run using this(i used to use this)

@echo off java *.java
but instead this is the only thing that works

@ECHO OFF SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
and this does not

@echo off SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java *.java
Anyone help?

Read full topic
